Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 129th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2017...
Injured on 4/27/2018 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Traded from San Francisco to Cincinnati on 3/2/2019 (Going to SF: 2B John Losey, P Deangelo Barragan, 1B Raul Rivera, P George Mundell. Going to CIN: SS Wayne Weaver, C Kenneth Opitz)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/4/2019, off Marcelo Rego (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/2019, off Russell Anderton (COL)...
Injured on 9/12/2019 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 3/12/2020 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 4/14/2021 with a Broken Ribs, out for 2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Boston on 6/15/2022...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,342,857 through salary arbitration...
